description:
PsPing implements Ping functionality, TCP ping, latency and bandwidth measurement.

#### Command line usage

__psping__ __-?__ [__i__|__t__|__l__|__b__]

__-? I__    Usage for ICMP ping.

__-? T__    Usage for TCP ping.

__-? L__    Usage for latency test.

__-? B__    Usage for bandwidth test.
author: Mark Russinovich
